item.title: Python Programming

Data System Data Exploring & Visualization Hands on zepplin

Hands on Zepplin: Step by Step In order to build a data playground enabling the engineers to explore data collected by autonomous cars, I am trying to deploy Apache Zepplin as a component of data platform.
